# Implement HiiiWAV info bot (2025-12-07 22:00Z)

_**User (2025-12-04 21:12Z)**_

Add a chatbot that can provide information about HiiiWAV. Not sensitive personal information, but information that a visitor might ask and that are present on the site. You can also create an FAQ that it can pull from, anticipating times of questions that people might want to know, such as:



- How can I donate to HiiiWAV?

- Where's HiiiWAV located?

- When is HiiiWAV FEST

- I'm a musician, and are there programs that I can apply for?

- Et cetera, et cetera.



All those kinds of questions should be answerable by the bot. 

---

_**Agent (model claude-4.5-opus-high-thinking, mode Plan)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user wants to add a chatbot to their HiiiWAV website that can answer visitor questions about the organization. Let me first explore the codebase to understand:

1. The current site structure and tech stack
2. What information is available on the site that the chatbot should know about
3. If there's already any chat component (I see `components/ai/chat-widget.tsx` in the project layout)
4. The pages and content available to inform the FAQ

Let me start by reading the existing chat widget and understanding the site structure.</details></think>

{
  "contents": "'use client'\n\nimport { useState } from 'react'\nimport { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'\nimport { Input } from '@/components/ui/input'\nimport { MessageCircle, X } from 'lucide-react'\n\ntype Message = {\n  role: 'user' | 'assistant'\n  content: string\n}\n\nexport function ChatWidget() {\n  const [open, setOpen] = useState(false)\n  const [input, setInput] = useState('')\n  const [messages, setMessages] = useState&lt;Message[]&gt;([])\n  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false)\n\n  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) =&gt; {\n    e.preventDefault()\n    if (!input.trim() || isLoading) return\n\n    const userMessage: Message = { role: 'user', content: input }\n    setMessages(prev =&gt; [...prev, userMessage])\n    setInput('')\n    setIsLoading(true)\n\n    try {\n      const res = await fetch('/api/ai/chat', {\n        method: 'POST',\n        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n        body: JSON.stringify({ messages: [...messages, userMessage] }),\n      })\n\n      if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to get response')\n      \n      const reader = res.body?.getReader()\n      if (!reader) throw new Error('No reader')\n\n      const decoder = new TextDecoder()\n      let assistantMessage = ''\n\n      while (true) {\n        const { done, value } = await reader.read()\n        if (done) break\n        assistantMessage += decoder.decode(value)\n      }\n\n      setMessages(prev =&gt; [...prev, { role: 'assistant', content: assistantMessage }])\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error('Chat error:', error)\n      setMessages(prev =&gt; [...prev, { role: 'assistant', content: 'Sorry, something went wrong.' }])\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false)\n    }\n  }\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"fixed bottom-4 right-4 z-50\"&gt;\n      {open ? (\n        &lt;div className=\"bg-background border rounded-lg shadow-2xl w-96 h-[600px] flex flex-col\"&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"p-4 border-b flex justify-between items-center\"&gt;\n            &lt;h3 className=\"font-semibold\"&gt;Chat with HIIIWAV&lt;/h3&gt;\n            &lt;Button variant=\"ghost\" size=\"icon\" onClick={() =&gt; setOpen(false)}&gt;\n              &lt;X className=\"h-4 w-4\" /&gt;\n            &lt;/Button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          \n          &lt;div className=\"flex-1 overflow-y-auto p-4 space-y-4\"&gt;\n            {messages.length === 0 &amp;&amp; (\n              &lt;div className=\"text-center text-muted-foreground text-sm\"&gt;\n                Ask me anything about HIIIWAV!\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n            )}\n            {messages.map((m, i) =&gt; (\n              &lt;div key={i} className={m.role === 'user' ? 'text-right' : 'text-left'}&gt;\n                &lt;div className={&#96;inline-block p-3 rounded-lg max-w-[80%] ${\n                  m.role === 'user' \n                    ? 'bg-primary text-primary-foreground' \n                    : 'bg-muted'\n                }&#96;}&gt;\n                  {m.content}\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n            ))}\n            {isLoading &amp;&amp; (\n              &lt;div className=\"text-left\"&gt;\n                &lt;div className=\"inline-block p-3 rounded-lg bg-muted\"&gt;\n                  &lt;div className=\"flex gap-1\"&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"w-2 h-2 rounded-full bg-foreground/50 animate-bounce\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"w-2 h-2 rounded-full bg-foreground/50 animate-bounce [animation-delay:0.2s]\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"w-2 h-2 rounded-full bg-foreground/50 animate-bounce [animation-delay:0.4s]\" /&gt;\n                  &lt;/div&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n            )}\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          \n          &lt;form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className=\"p-4 border-t flex gap-2\"&gt;\n            &lt;Input\n              value={input}\n              onChange={(e) =&gt; setInput(e.target.value)}\n              placeholder=\"Ask me anything...\"\n              className=\"flex-1\"\n              disabled={isLoading}\n            /&gt;\n            &lt;Button type=\"submit\" disabled={isLoading || !input.trim()}&gt;\n              Send\n            &lt;/Button&gt;\n          &lt;/form&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      ) : (\n        &lt;button\n          onClick={() =&gt; setOpen(true)}\n          className=\"bg-[#99FF69] text-black p-4 rounded-full shadow-lg hover:scale-110 transition-transform hover:bg-[#7ACC54] h-14 w-14 flex items-center justify-center\"\n          aria-label=\"Open chat\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;MessageCircle className=\"h-6 w-6\" /&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n      )}\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  )\n}\n",

Now I have a comprehensive understanding of the HiiiWAV website. Let me summarize what I found:

**Existing Infrastructure:**
- Chat widget already exists at `components/ai/chat-widget.tsx`
- API route at `app/api/ai/chat/route.ts` using OpenAI GPT-4o
- AI SDK is already installed (`@ai-sdk/openai`, `ai`)

**Current Implementation:**
- The chat widget is functional but has a very generic system prompt
- No FAQ or knowledge base built in

**Site Content to Include in FAQ/Knowledge Base:**
1. **About HiiiWAV:**
   - Creative tech incubator in Oakland
   - Address: 2781 Telegraph Ave, Oakland, CA
   - Contact: info@hiiiwav.org
   - 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization
   - Social: Instagram @hiiiwav, YouTube @hiiiwav

2. **Programs:**
   - **Code Vibes**: 8-week program teaching AI and software, free for accepted applicants, no coding required
   - **Joint Ventures/HiiiFrequency**: Residency program for artist businesses, fiscal sponsorship
   - **AFRO AI**: Legacy program (predecessor to Code Vibes)

3. **Events:**
   - **HiiiWAV FEST**: Signature festival with music, panels, workshops
   - **Oakland Tech Week**: Partner event, city-wide celebration
   - **Demo Days**: Showcase events

4. **Funding:**
   - **HiiiWAV 50 Fund**: $50M target fund with endowment, real estate, community ownership
   - **Donations**: Tax-deductible, one-time or monthly options
   - Contact: fund@hiiiwav.org

5. **Impact Stats:**
   - 50+ artists supported
   - $500K+ funding distributed
   - 20+ events hosted
   - 1000+ community members

I'll develop a strategic approach to enhance the chatbot's knowledge base. The goal is to create a robust, informative system that provides comprehensive information about HiiiWAV's mission, programs, and community impact. I'll focus on designing a flexible FAQ structure that can be easily updated and integrated into the existing chat infrastructure.

Key considerations include determining the most effective method of knowledge integration and ensuring the chatbot can provide accurate, context-aware responses about HiiiWAV's initiatives and community engagement.</details></think>

All done! Here's what was implemented:

## Summary

### 1. Chat Widget on All Pages
Added `ChatWidget` to the root `app/layout.tsx` so it now appears on every page of the site.

### 2. FAQ Knowledge Base (`lib/hiiiwav-knowledge.ts`)
Created a comprehensive knowledge base covering:
- **About HiiiWAV**: Mission, location (2781 Telegraph Ave, Oakland), contact emails
- **Programs**: Code Vibes (free 8-week program, no coding experience required), Joint Ventures, HiiiFrequency
- **Events**: HiiiWAV FEST, Oakland Tech Week, Demo Days
- **Donations**: How to donate, tax-deductible info, impact stats
- **For Musicians/Artists**: How to apply, available programs
- **HiiiWAV 50 Fund**: $50M fund details, ways to partner

### 3. Updated Chat API
Updated `app/api/ai/chat/route.ts` to use the knowledge base in the system prompt. Also switched to `gpt-4o-mini` for faster, more cost-effective responses.

### 4. Enhanced Events Page
Improved `app/events/page.tsx` with date-based groupings:
- **Upcoming events**: "This Week", "This Month", next month name, "Coming Up"
- **Past events**: Grouped by month/year (e.g., "December 2024", "November 2024")

The chatbot can now answer questions like:
- "How can I donate to HiiiWAV?"
- "Where is HiiiWAV located?"
- "I'm a musician, what programs can I apply for?"
- "What is Code Vibes?"
- "When is HiiiWAV FEST?"
